affirmations.text: I am happy with who I am
I am optimistic. I am hopeful. I am confident.
I am strength. I am energetic. I am powerful
I am open to receive. I am abundant. I am blessed.
I believe in myself. I am motiviated. I am dedicated
I am confident. I am fearless. I am taking action today
I am powerful. I am persistent. I am strong
I am freedom. I am open. I am wise.
